message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'll be interested in. It's priced at $130. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $115? It's a fair compromise that leaves us both with a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $105? That's the lowest I can go.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $105 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to go down to $110 as a final offer.  If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to move on to other buyers.
I understand that you're trying to make a deal, but I'm really close to my budget. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll take the deal.
